oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Getting Paid by the Hour Yields More Profits
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, Paul E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hourly fee
services rendered
veterinary practice
fee structures
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Compensation for services rendered with an hourly fee has allowed many veterinarians the opportunity to boost their profitability. This type of fee structure affords the practitioner the ability to offer a broader range of services. In many instances, these services do not lend themselves to fee structures that depend upon animal units or procedures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 2; 189-190
